**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 37 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 35 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 32 [Master Xun](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1482) **Source** [Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!](/Sources.aspx?ID=86) pg. 23 **Perception** +25 **Languages** [Tien](/Languages.aspx?ID=43) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +26, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +27, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +24, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +26, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +26, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +26 **Str** +5 **Dex** +4 **Con** +4 **Int** +0 **Wis** +3 **Cha** +2 **Items** _+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [shock](/Equipment.aspx?ID=303) [dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)_ --- **AC** 36 **Fort** +26 **Ref** +24 **Will** +23 **HP** 250 --- **Speed** 25 feet, climb 15 feet **Melee** dagger +28 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 2d4+13 piercing plus 1d6 electricity **Ranged** dagger +28 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)), **Damage** 2d4+13 piercing plus 1d6 electricity **Lasting Debilitating Strike** **Trigger** The xun's Strike hits a [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creature and deals damage; **Effect** The xun applies one of the following debilitations, which lasts until the end of the xun's next turn or for 1 week on a critical hit.
  • **Debilitation** The target takes a –10-foot status penalty to its Speeds.
  • **Debilitation** The target becomes [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13).
**Looming Threat** The master xun Steps or [Feints](/Actions.aspx?ID=48), then [Demoralizes](/Actions.aspx?ID=53). **[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)** The master xun deals an extra 3d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) opponents.
